name: Waing Lamin Aung
description: '''Waing Lamin Aung''' ({{langx|my|ဝိုင်းလမင်းအောင်}}; born 1999, also spelt '''Wine Lamin Aung''') is a traditional [[Burmese people|Burmese]] [[Mahāgīta|classical]], [[Country music|country]], and [[dhamma]] singer. A child singer, he competed in ''Starlet's Sky'', a children's singing competition broadcast on [[Myawaddy TV]]. He was mentored by renowned classical vocalist Min Naung. In 2015, he received the [[Yangon City FM Awards|Yangon City FM Award]] for Bestselling Traditional Burmese Male Vocalist for his album, ''May You Be Fulfilled'' (ပြည့်စုံနိုင်ပါစေ). He graduated from [[Basic Education High School No. 2 Kamayut]], after transferring from Basic Education High School No. 3 Botataung in the ninth grade. {{as of|2020|February}}, he attended the [[National University of Arts and Culture, Yangon]], studying music.
